Text: Leadership Subcommittee of Culture Committee Cc As part of the Culture Committee discussions Leadership has been identified as an area of concern at Enron There are of course many definitions of leadership and as such we would like to define leadership as it applies to Enrons culture and business objectives As a result we think it is important to meet with each of you to discuss your views of how leadership at Enron should be defined We believe the best way to achieve this end is to discuss with each of you The criteria you used to choose Enrons current business leaders The attributes you believe Enrons leaders should possess Whether or not and to what extent you believe leadership impacts the bottom line at Enron We would prefer to have this discussion with both of you together But that may be an impossible task I will speak with each of your assistants to arrange a convenient time to discuss these issues Thanks Sean

Invitation Brief Meeting with Ken Lay and Jeff Skilling Leadership Subcommittee of Culture Committe May PM CDTChairperson Sean Long Invitees Jeff Skilling Joannie Williamson Kenneth Lay Rosa Lee Flemming Date Time PM PM Central Standard Time Description Brief Meeting with Ken Lay and Jeff Skilling Leadership Subcommittee of Culture Committe Detailed Description
